description:
Word 4 Authors offers students expert instruction in MS Word so they can properly format their books for self-publishing on Amazon, CreateSpace, and Draft2Digital.

There are a total of 10 sections, including:

  • Introduction to the Course
  • Introduction to Word
  • Starting From Scratch
  • Starting From a Previously Formatted Manuscript
  • Working on Your Manuscript
  • Finalizing Your Manuscript
  • CreateSpace
  • Draft2Digital
  • Tools and Resources
  • Bonuses

In each section, students will find step-by-step video tutorials walking them through each phase of the formatting process. There is also a self-check exercise at the end of each section where students can test their newfound skills, if they so desire. Following each self-check exercise, the answer is provided so that students can compare their answer to the correct answer and self-assess their learning.

Finally, students will find a variety of templates given by the instructor so that each student has a starting point for publishing expertly formatted manuscripts.
title: Word 4 Authors
